page.title: 02FARMING,ANNAN
page.content: I carried out a survey of the farms in our school's block since 75% of our area is farmland. The main crop is grass which is used for grazing cattle and sheep.Some of the grass is cut to make hay or silage. Barley is commonly grown as are vegetables like potatoes. Many of the farms keep animals.Cows are kept for dairying.Sheep are common and one farmer rears calves.One farmer keeps two goats from which he gets milk. Some of the land nearest The Solway shore is rough grazing land and is used to keep horses.
